title: Ep. 798 - Science Is Dead. (And We Have Killed It.)
description:
The Department of Energy pushes racial science, a squish Republican takes a spot on the “1/6 Commission,” and “Speechless” becomes a #1 national bestseller!
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
